title: 13-year-old shot accidentally by father in Southfield
content:
Southfield police reported a 13-year-old girl was accidentally shot in the thigh by her father on Tuesday night as the man was putting his 9-mm handgun down.
Police said the bullet went through the wound and did not hit any organ in her body. The girl was in stable condition at a local hospital on Wednesday.
The incident occurred at a home on the 23000 block of Lake Ravines Drive at around 10:25 p.m. on Tuesday.
Police said the father cooperated with the investigators. The mother and the daughter were also interviewed and their statements matched with the father’s.

There is no word on any charges, if any, and Southfield Police Deputy Chief Nick Loussia said the matter is under investigation.
— Staff writer Aftab Borka
